═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════
                    THE TRUTH
═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════

You weren't sent here to investigate.

You were sent here to bury it.

The files. The evidence. The connections.

They knew. They always knew.

And they sent you—the perfect tool. The perfect cover.

Because you're good at this. You're good at making things disappear.

Just like you made the others disappear.

Wait.

No.

That's not—

Is it?

═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════
